Verses: 1 allelooyaa, Karththarai Thudhiyungal; Avar Nallavar, Avar Kirubai Endrumulladhu.
2 karththarudaiya Vallamaiyaana Seygaigalai Solli, Avarudaiya Thudhiyaiyellaam Pirasthaabappaduththaththakkavan Yaar?
3 niyaayaththai Kaikkollugiravargalum, Ekkaalaththilum Needhiyaiseygiravargalum Baakkiyavaangal.
4 karththaave, Neer Therindhukondavargalin Nanmaiyai Naan Kandu, Ummudaiya Jaadhiyin Magizhchchiyaal Magizhndhu, Ummudaiya Sudhandharaththode Menmaipaaraattumpadikku,
5 ummudaiya Janangalukku Neer Paaraattum Kirubaiyinpadi Ennai Ninaiththu, Ummudaiya Ratchippinaal Ennai Sandhiththarulum.
6 engal Pidhaakkalodunkooda Naangalum Paavanseydhu, Akkiramam Nadappiththu, Aagaamiyampanninom.
7 engal Pidhaakkal Egipthile Ummudaiya Adhisayangalai Unaraamalum, Ummudaiya Kirubaigalin Thiratchiyai Ninaiyaamalum Poi, Sivandhasamuththira Oraththile Kalagampanninaargal.
8 aanaalum Avar Thamadhu Vallamaiyai Velippaduththumpadi, Thammudaiya Naamaththinimiththam Avargalai Ratchiththaar.
9 avar Sivandha Samuththiraththai Adhattinaar, Adhu Vatrippoyitru; Vettaandharaiyil Nadakkiradhupola Avargalai Aazhangalil Nadandhupogappanninaar.
10 pagaignan Kaikku Avargalai Vilakki Ratchiththu, Saththuruvin Kaikku Avargalai Vilakki Meettaar.
11 avargal Saththurukkalai Thanneergal Moodikkondadhu; Avargalil Oruvanum Meendhirukkavillai.
12 appozhudhu Avargal Avarudaiya Vaarththaigalai Visuvaasiththu, Avarudaiya Thudhiyai Paadinaargal.
13 aanaalum Seekkiramaai Avarudaiya Kiriyaigalai Marandhaargal; Avarudaiya Aalosanaikku Avargal Kaaththiraamal,
14 vanaandharaththile Ichchaiyullavargalaagi, Avaandharaveliyile Dhevanai Pareetchaipaarththaargal.
15 appozhudhu Avargal Kettadhai Avargalukku Koduththaar, Avargal Aaththumaakkalilo Ilaippai Anuppinaar.
16 paalayaththil Avargal Moseyinmelum, Karththarudaiya Parisuththanaagiya Aaroninmelum Poraamaikondaargal.
17 boomi Pilandhu Thaaththaanai Vizhungi, Abiraamin Koottaththaarai Moodippottadhu.
18 avargal Koottaththil Akkinipatriyerindhadhu; Akkinijuvaalai Dhunmaarkkarai Eriththuppottadhu.
19 avargal Orebile Oru Kandrukkuttiyaiyundaakki, Vaarppikkappatta Vikkiragaththai Namaskariththaargal.
20 thangal Magimaiyai Pullai Thingira Maattin Saayalaaga Maatrinaargal.
21 egipthile Periya Kiriyaigalaiyum, Kaamin Dhesaththile Adhisayangalaiyum, Sivandha Samuththiraththandaiyile Bayangaramaanavaigalaiyum Seydhavaraagiya,
22 thangal Ratchagaraana Dhevanai Marandhaargal.

23 aagaiyaal, Avargalai Naasampannuven Endraar; Appozhudhu Avaraal Therindhukollappatta Mose, Avargalai Avar Azhikkaadhapadikku, Avarudaiya Ukkiraththai Aatrumporuttu, Avarukku Munbaagath Thirappin Vaayile Nindraan.
24 avarudaiya Vaarththaiyai Visuvaasiyaamal, Ichchikkappadaththakka Dhesaththai Asattaipanninaargal.
25 karththarudaiya Saththaththirku Sevikodaamal, Thangal Koodaarangalil Murumuruththaargal.
26 appozhudhu Avargal Vanaandharaththile Madiyavum, Avargal Sandhadhi Jaadhigalukkulle Azhiyavum,
27 avargal Parpala Dhesangalile Sidharadikkappadavum, Avargalukku Virodhamaaga Thammudaiya Kaiyai Eduththaar.
28 avargal Paagaalpeyorai Patrikkondu, Jeevanillaadhavaigalukku Itta Baligalai Pusiththu,
29 thangal Kiriyaigalinaal Avarukku Kobam Moottinaargal; Aagaiyaal Vaadhai Avargalukkul Pugundhadhu.
30 appozhudhu Pinegaas Ezhundhu Nindru Niyaayanseydhaan; Adhinaal Vaadhai Niruththappattadhu.
31 adhu Thalaimurai Thalaimuraiyaaga Endraikkum Avanukku Needhiyaaga Ennappattadhu.
32 meribaavin Thanneergalidaththilum Avarukku Kadunkobam Moottinaargal; Avargal Nimiththam Mosekkum Pollaappu Vandhadhu.
33 avargal Avan Aaviyai Visanappaduththinadhinaale, Than Udhadugalinaal Padharippesinaan.
34 karththar Thangalukku Sonnapadi, Avargal Andha Janangalai Azhikkavillai.
35 jaadhigaludane Kalandhu, Avargal Kiriyaigalai Katru;
36 avargaludaiya Vikkiragangalai Seviththaargal; Avaigal Avargalukku Kanniyaayitru.
37 avargal Thangal Kumaararaiyum Thangal Kumaaraththigalaiyum Pisaasugalukku Baliyittaargal.
38 avargal Kaanaandhesaththu Vikkiragangalukku Baliyittu, Thangal Kumaarar Kumaaraththigaludaiya Kutramillaadha Raththaththai Sindhinaargal; Dhesam Raththaththaal Theettuppattadhu.
39 avargal Thangal Kiriyaigalinaal Asuththamaagi, Thangal Seygaigalinaal Soramponaargal.
40 adhinaal Karththarudaiya Kobam Thamadhu Janaththinmel Moondadhu; Avar Thamadhu Sudhandharaththai Aruvaruththaar.
41 avargalai Jaadhigaludaiya Kaiyil Oppukkoduththaar; Avargaludaiya Pagaignar Avargalai Aandaargal.
42 avargaludaiya Saththurukkal Avargalai Odukkinaargal; Avargaludaiya Kaiyinkeezh Thaazhththappattaargal.
43 anegandharam Avargalai Viduviththaar; Avargalo Thangal Yosanaiyinaal Avarukku Virodhamaai Kalagampanni, Thangaludaiya Akkiramaththinaal Sirumaippaduththappattaargal.
44 avargal Kooppidudhalai Avar Ketkumbodho, Avargalukku Undaana Idukkaththai Avar Kannokki,
45 avargalukkaaga Thamadhu Udanpadikkaiyai Ninaiththu, Thamadhu Migundha Kirubaiyinpadi Manasthaapappattu,
46 avargalai Siraipidiththa Yaavarum Avargalukku Irangumpadi Seydhaar.
47 engal Dhevanaagiya Karththaave, Naangal Umadhu Parisuththa Naamaththaippotri, Ummai Thudhikkiradhil Menmaipaaraattumpadi Engalai Ratchiththu, Engalai Jaadhigalilirundhu Serththarulum.
48 isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Anaadhiyaai Endrendraikkum Sthoththirikkappadaththakkavar. Janangalellaarum: Aamen, Allelooyaa Enbaargalaaga.
